q: How long does a flood-barrier installation take?
a: Average residential project: one day for three openings. Large or multi-story properties: two to three days including inspection. See inspection requirements.
1) Site survey → 2) PE design → 3) Permitting → 4) Fabrication → 5) Installation → 6) Inspection → 7) Owner training.

q: When should I schedule before hurricane season?
a: Order 6–8 weeks prior to June 1 to guarantee completion. Rush installs available in May–August under our priority program.
